title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2205.7 - Disclosure by employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2205.7 - Disclosure by employees

State Regulations

It shall be unlawful for any officer or employee of the

Division of Housing and Community Renewal, or for any official advisor or
consultant to the Division of Housing and Community Renewal, to disclose, otherwise than in the course of official duty, any information obtained under
the Rent Law, or to use any such information for personal
benefit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2205.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
